segments.text: Can you hold the end of this tape measure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ' m taking some measurements for new curtains .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about measuring the floor for a new carpet , and the walls for new wallpaper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought we'll just fix up the wood floor.and use some paint for the walls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . I was thinking the same myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tomorrow we'll go and pick out some curtains and paint .
segments.speaker: S1
